@petehanssens @simonwaight @Netlify @AzureStaticApps Got it. In Netlify, all environments/contexts are in the same global infra, so staging and prod infra are the identical. You use branch builds to create contextual environments. And you can have contextual env vars for different creds. https://t.co/l49ASNU45j
